caption: This photograph captures a tranquil lakeside scene partially framed by two trees and pine branches. In the foreground, a "For Sale" sign is attached to a tree trunk. The sign mentions 'ASA M. CLARK, Jr. Realtor' and provides an address along with a phone number, encouraging interested parties to call "ED SHERMAN." The serene backdrop of the image features a calm and expansive body of water, presumably a lake, under a clear sky. The colors are vivid; the blue of the lake provides a stark contrast to the rich browns and greens of the tree and its branches.
title: Realty is big business. (From the Documerica-1 exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 18, 19, 37, 38, 58.)
